action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"I have been tasked to defend this magical crystal from these dreadful creatures."{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.3){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.5){###}"Press E"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"W A S D to move"{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.3){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.5){###}"Try it"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"Press left click to attack."{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.3){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.5){###}"Press E"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"I am a magician, to use my skills press 1 2 3 4"{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.3){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.5){###}"Try it"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"I can buy upgrades by pressing Z"{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.3){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.5){###}"Press Z"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"Time won't pause while in the Store"{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.2){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.6){###}"Press E"{###}"Dialogue"

action.name: Call function
action.param: playableCharacters.name{###}"Hover each item, be sure to read what each does. All costs increases each time you buy an item."{###}Function.Call("relWidth", "Dialogue", 0.6){###}Function.Call("relHeight", "Dialogue", 0.2){###}"Press Z to go back"{###}"Dialogue"
